entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023
